full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RANG GI DRIN RTZA BA'I BLA MA DANG RJE BTZUN RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU GNYIS DBYER MED PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES BLA MA MGON PO DBYER MED BDE CHEN MRA BO'I GTZO MO BCAS KYI BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR 'DI NI KHAL KHA KHU RE CHEN MO'I ZHU THE NI'I KHAM TSAN GYI GRVA RIGS DAD BRTZON LDAN PA 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS 'PHEL NAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, THE SONG SPRUL MA'I YE SHES THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS GA-YAR KHRAL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DAM GTZANG DU YE SHES BSHAD SGRUB BO, ,DZA YANTU BHA RNANTU SARBA BARTU, ,)
author_simple: YE SHES THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO,
